attributes.action: bring the minimum wage to increase to a realistic £7 level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the current financial circumstances, I do believe to maintain our economy and pension contributions for our future, I am pledging you to be bold and raise the bar to bring all workers, public and private sectors to a realistic living standard of pay.  A minimum of £7, would suffice this realistic goal.
Thank you
ps GB needs a strong economy
